"A.P.238/4/9/10:55": "You can't go by yourself, it's a rule of this event."
"You have to attend in a party, going alone will forfeit the event."
"So hurry up and find a party?"
"... or are you some kind of loner or something?"
"Sorry, I didn't mean anything by that! It just seems that you're by yourself pretty often."
"It seems that pairing with me might be a good change of pace."
"Might as well, right? If you have any problems, I can go back early."
"Anyways, it's starting soon, so hurry up."
